form.write_down_notes: Write down any notes you have here

login.title: Welcome Back
login.intro: Login to your account to access your personal plans and goals.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.intro: Fill out your email, so we can send you the password reset instructions.
forgot_password.thanks_text: Thank you! We've sent you an email. Please follow the steps in the mail.

buttons.new_account: Sign up for a new account instead

password_reset.title: Reset your password
password_reset.intro: Welcome back! Please enter a new password and don't forget again. üôèüèº
password_reset.intro_forbidden: Hey! üëÄ Either you didn't request this, or you've waited too long.

signup.title: Hey There! üëãüèº
signup.intro: Create an account to see your schedules and goals, chat with your nutritionist and get real-time data.

step_success.title: Account created!
step_success.intro: Please complete the following steps to use the LifeLifting Mirror.

step_one.title: Step 1: Basic personal data
step_one.intro: Psst, you already filled out the basic data. If you made a mistake, don't worry. You can edit your whole profile after signing up. Click the button to go to the next step!

form.hear_from_us_label: How did you hear from us?

step_two.subtitle: Pick a package and get a consultation
step_two.title: Step 2: Choose a package
step_two.already_chosen_2: You can change your package choice later after signing up. Click the button to go to the next step!

step_three.subtitle: Pick wisely
step_three.title: Step 3: Choose a Specialist
step_three.already_chosen: Ooops! You already chose a specialist. Go to the next dashboard by clicking the button below. If you want to change your specialist later. That's allowed after one week of trial.

step_four.subtitle: Choose a date
step_four.title: Step 4: Plan your first appointment
step_four.intro: You already planned an appointment. Once the appointment is done, you'll go on to the payment. Go to the next step to follow the status of your requested appointment and to chat with your specialist.

limbo.past_due_date: Did the specialist forget to accept/cancel it and it's past due date?

step_done.title: Cheers to planning that in! üçª
step_done.intro: Congrats on looking for a better version of yourself. Thank you for your trust in LifeLifting Nutrition.
step_done.will_confirm: will confirm your consultation as soon as possible.

not_accepted.title: Oh.. Appointment not accepted!
not_accepted.subtitle_1: The specialist couldn't fit your request in his schedule. Please contact

appointment_status.title: Appointment status
appointment_status.subtitle_1: If you see your appointment down here. Congrats! Then it has been accepted. If not, please wait untill the specialist accepts your request. Is it taking a long time? Please contact
appointment_status.subtitle_2: if you have any trouble, or for any further questions.

completed_appointment.title: Nice, you completed your first appointment!
completed_appointment.subtitle_1: But your payment hasn't been processed yet. Make sure you've paid. Don't hesitate contacting
completed_appointment.subtitle_2: if you have any trouble with your payment, or for any further questions.

subscription_ended.title: Aww.. Your subscription has ended
subscription_ended.subtitle_1: We hope you had an awesome growth in your time with LifeLifting. And you're always welcome to train with

all_completed.title: Looks like everything is ok!
all_completed.subtitle: You've completed all the steps. Click the button below to continue to the dashboard.

users.title: The Users of LifeLifting
users.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the users. You can view quick contact info and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add one. üòÉ

list_item.tooltip: User hasn't completed the Signup process yet

client.title: The Clients of LifeLifting
client.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the clients. You can view quick contact info and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add one. üòÉ

guidelines.title: My Guidelines
guidelines.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the guidelines you created. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a guideline. üìÑ

mealplans.title: My Mealplans
mealplans.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the mealplans you created. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a mealplan. üìÑ

form.account_settings_detail: These are the account details of the client. Write them down so you can send them to 'em!
form.email_as_user: The Email will be used as Username
form.personal_intro: Tell us the first and last name so we can display it in his/her dashboard and greet the user in a more personal way.

specialist.title: The Specialists of LifeLifting
specialist.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the specialists. You can view quick contact info and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add one. üòÉ

general.safe_warning: Setting it for your client is safer
general.safe_warning_s: Setting it for your specialist is safer
general.safe_warning_u: Setting it for your user is safer

form.account_settings_detail: These are the account details of the specialist. Write them down so you can send them to 'em
form.personal_data: Basic data that we need from the specialist. Some of this data will be displayed at step 4 of the signup process. This can be important in the decision making process of the future client.
form.profile_image_detail: Please choose a clear picture that represents the present appearance of this person.
form.about_specialist_ph: Please enter the most recent - working - phone number. Also, please write a small description that users can read :).
form.experience_detail: How experienced is this specialist? Clients will obviously care about this, so decide this with the specialist herself.
form.specialist_location: Where is this specialist situated? Pick a GMT to know at what times to call or not to call.
form.languages_detail: Add languages to the specialist so we can hook them up with the right clients. This way we will also be able to know in which markets we are active.

errors.8_chars: Must contain 8 characters, letters and numbers

shopping_list.title: Shopping list
shopping_list.intro_1: This shopping list is for mealplan
shopping_list.intro_2: You can print this shopping list by clicking on the button in the top right corner or you can open it on your phone and cross off the items while you're in the supermarket.

online.title: Online call
online.contact_method_placeholder: How would you like to be contacted?

signup.meet_method: How is the meeting taking place?

form.suitable_time: Please provide a suitable time. Requests for times that are already taken, are not secured spots.
form.taking_place_how: How is this meeting taking place?
form.pick_date_icon: Pick a date or click the icon

general.urinate_a_day: How many times he/she is urinating per day
general.will_use_supps: Is willing to use a supplement
general.social_life: Goes out at night to have a social life
general.cook_at_home: The one that cooks at home
general.plenty_time: Has plenty of time for breakfast

general.travel_home: Time to travel from home to work
general.simple_snack: Can have simple snack during work time

general_info_1.step_intro: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to provide the best service.
general_info_1.main_goal: What is your main goal for a meal plan?
general_info_1.born_future: You will be born in the future üîÆ

habits.step_intro: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.

form.social_life: Goes out at night to have a social life
form.wake_up_time: At what time do you wake up?
form.bed_time: At what time do go to sleep?
form.breakfast_time: At what time do you have breakfast?
form.dinner_time: At what time do you have dinner?
form.breakfast_home: Do you have breakfast at home?
form.plenty_breakfast_time: Do you have plenty of time for breakfast
form.work_weekends: Do you work on the weekends?
form.home_to_work: How long does it take you from home to work? (in minutes)
form.work_to_home: And how long does it take from work to home? (in minutes)
form.snack_during_work: Can you have a very simple and practical snack while you work?
form.snack_level: Do you prefer your snacks to be elaborate or simple?
form.kitchen_gadgets: Do you have kitchen gadgets at work?

body_functions.step_intro: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.

form.urinate_each_day: How many times do you urinate each day?
form.urinate_at_night: Do you wake up to urinate in the middle of the night?
form.every_day: Do you have them every day?
form.times_per_week: How many times a day do you have them per week?
form.bowel_movements_a_day: How many times a day do you have bowel movements?
form.same_movements: Do you always go at the same moments?
form.appetite_category: From 1 to 10, 10 being ‚ÄúI‚Äôm always hungry‚Äù, where would you categorize your appetite in general
form.hungry_time: Time of the day when you feel the most hungry
form.trouble_sleep: Do you have trouble falling asleep?

female.title: Female
female.first_period: How old were you at your first menstrual period?
female.regular_cycle: Do you have a regular menstrual cycle right now?
female.birth_control_pills: Do you take any birth control pills?
female.period_x_days: I have my period every X days. Fill in X.
female.bleed_x_days: I bleed for X days. Fill in X.
female.times_pregnant: How many times were you pregnant?

general_info_2.step_intro: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.

form.have_conditions: Do you have any health conditions?
form.2_week_conditions: During the past two weeks I had
form.no_go_products: Products you can't eat or drink
form.dinner_type: Is it a plate of food like lunch, or is it more like a snack?
form.eat_after_dinner: Do you usually eat after dinner?
form.who_shops: Who does the shopping at home?
form.have_physical_activities: Do you do any physical activities?
form.arrive_time: How long does it take you to get there?
form.wakeup_time: At what time do you have to wake up
form.order_food: Do you usually order food/eat outside?
form.use_supplement: Would you be willing to use a supplement if necessary?

general.recap_desc: A quick recap at the thoughts on the last mealplan.

form.recap_intro: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.
form.import_mealplan: Import a mealplan you created for
form.change_never_again: What do you want to change and never see again?
form.see_on_mealplans: What would you like to see on your meal plans?
form.routine_detail: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.
form.bowel_freq: How is your bowel Movement Frequency?
form.water_intake: How is your water intake going?
form.activity_frequency: What did you think about the frequency of the activity?
form.activity_opinion: What did you think about the activity itself?
form.change_something: Would you like to change something?
form.supp_opinion: What did you think about the supplementation proposed?
form.meals_habits_detail: Please get as much information from the client as you can, in order to make a better and more personal meal plan the next time.
form.preperation_trouble: Are you having trouble with any of the preparations?
form.meals_per_day: The amount of meals you eat per day

errors.no_mealplan_for: There is no mealplan for {{name}} yet.

package.title: Package
package.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the packages. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a package. üòÉ

form.package_info_detail: Basic data that we need from the package. This data will be displayed at step 2 of the signup process. This can be important in the decision making process of the future client.
form.already_taken: Check the package list for the numbers already taken.
form.about_detail: Please write a small description that users can read. This will be vital to the decision making of the future client.
form.short_desc_ph: Write a short but attractive description
form.amount_time_desc: How long does the package go for? This is important for an eventually future implementation of an automatic renew subscription notification.
form.price_intro: How much will it cost? We will calculate your profit under the hood if you'd like!
form.extras_detail: Add languages to the specialist so we can hook them up with the right clients. This way we will also be able  to know in which markets we are active.
form.package_pros: What's the plus of this package?

errors.not_available: Woops! This package is not (yet) avaliable.
errors.not_available_detail: Please go back to the available packages on the packages tab.

guideline.title: Guidelines
guideline.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the guidelines you created. You can view and edit/delete them directly  from the list. With the top right button you add a guideline. üìÑ

form.link_measurement: Link a Measurement to this guideline
form.link_consultation: Link a First Consultation to this guideline
form.guideline_info_detail: The guideline for the client. This guideline has to be filled out on the first meeting with the client(!). This document is of huge importance, since we can calculate heaps of things based on the values you'll enter here. Be precise and ask thouroughly to be as personal as possible for you client.
form.number_taken: Check the guideline list for the numbers already taken.
form.target_reach: Define the targets that your users want to reach here.
form.calc_values_detail: We need to calculate some things under the hood. Help us by providing these values.
form.increase_decrease: Increase or decrease calories from the basal metabolism
form.how_many_calories: How many calories we are going to increase or decrease
form.factor_calorie: Factor Calorie: This is by how many times the basal amount of calories calculated by the system will be multiplied.
form.activities_for_detail: Describe more about the activity that the client mainly loves and does. Also put in the macro distribution values.
form.what_activity: Which activity does the client do?
form.how_long_activity: How long does the user do this activity?
form.macros_detail: Define the way the macros will be divided during the time the client follows this guideline. Please note: The total must add up to 100!

errors.not_available: üòî Woops! This guideline is not (yet) avaliable.
errors.not_available_detail: Please go back to the available guidelines on the guidelines tab.

mealplan.title: Mealplans
mealplan.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the mealplans you created. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a mealplan.

general.mealplan_add_intro: The mealplan for the client. This mealplan has to be filled out on the first meeting with the client(!). This document is of huge importance, since we can calculate heaps of things based on the values you'll enter here. Be precise and ask thouroughly to be as personal as possible for you client.
general.print_subtitle: Nutrition based Healthy life choices; avoiding disease rather than treating it
general.supps_detail: These are the supplements that should be taken before, during or after the exercise next to it. Your specialist has added these based on the info he/she got during the introduction meeting.

form.step_intro: Add ingredients and meals to the meal times you specified earlier. Add a maximum of 2 meals per meal time.
form.meal_title_placeholder: Name the meal based on the products
form.supps_for_detail: Define the supplements the user should take before, during and/or after the training. All values are optional. But first, pick a guideline to hook this mealplan up to.
form.import_guideline: Import a guideline you created for
form.number_taken: Check the mealplan list for the numbers already taken.
form.meal_times_detail: Define the meal times for this client. You will have to fill out meals for all the meal times you enter.
form.best_time: Which meal times suit the client best?
form.attach_name: Attach a name to the time
form.finally_done_intro_1: If you're done. Thanks for going through that process. Click the done button and see the mealplan appear live in the mealplan section of the client's profile!
form.finally_done_intro_2: If not, the meal button won't be clickable. Check the rest of the steps to see if you missed something!
form.another_client: If you choose another client, step 3 (supplements) will be overwritten

errors.no_mealtime: This meal doesn't contain a meal time yet...
errors.no_guideline: This user doesn't have any guidelines yet
errors.no_guideline_for: There is no guideline for {{name}} yet.
errors.fill_out_step_2: Fill out the meal times in step 2 to see something here
errors.fill_out_detail: To be able to create meals and add ingredients for this client's mealplan, you have to first specify when the client is going to eat.

form.write_for_detail: A few minutes of your time would be great, so {{name}} will know what his/her strong and weak points are.

errors.min_char_200: You have to have at least 200 characters, you have {{length}} characters at the moment.

general.no_past_consultations: No consultation has taken place yet

errors.signup_incomplete: Woops! You haven't completed the Signup process yet...
errors.signup_incomplete_detail: Complete the process or contact your specialist and tell him to hurry up! ‚åõ

my_clients.title: My Clients
my_clients.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of your clients. You can view quick contact info or click the more info button to check out their mealplans, guidelines, and more detailed information. üòÉ

my_reviews.title: My Reviews
my_reviews.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of your reviews. Try to keep your reviews positive, so new clients will be more likely to choose you. The reviews are sorted on date. üòÉ

exercises.title: Exercise
exercises.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the exercises you entered. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a exercise. ü§∏

form.exercise_info_detail: Basic data that we need from the package. This data will be displayed at step 2 of the signup process. This can be important in the decision making process of the future client.
form.exercises_taken: Check the exercise list for the numbers already taken.
form.exercise_image_detail: Please choose a clear picture that represents the appearance of this exercise item.
form.category_detail: Describe and add a few categories that describe the exercise/activity. Let's be detailed here, because we can maybe build a filter function later.
form.describe_category: What describes the category the best?
form.locations_detail: Describe and add a few locations where you can execute the exercise/activity. Be detailed, because we can maybe build a filter function later.
form.place_description: What describes the place the best?

errors.not_available: üòî Woops! This exercise is not (yet) avaliable.
errors.not_available_detail: Please go back to the available exercises on the exercises tab.

general.title: Saved Foods
general.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the foods you entered. You can view and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add a food.

form.food_info_detail: Basic data that we need from the package. This data will be displayed at step 2 of the signup process. This can be important in the decision making process of the future client.
form.already_taken: Check the food list for the numbers already taken.
form.shopping_name: Shopping list name for the product
form.food_image_detail: Please choose a clear picture that represents the appearance of this food product item.
form.food_category_detail: Put the product in a food category for filtering and organizing purposes.
form.nutrition_group_detail: Under which category does this product belong?
form.unit_value_detail: Indicate the measurement unit here. What is the best way to describe an amount of the product? Eg. 1 gram of eggs? Or 1 unit of eggs? This will be visible later when you start adding meal plans, and is an important part for the calculations.
form.shopping_list_unit: The Unit for the shopping list
form.calculation_factor: The calculation factor - see example down
form.preperations_detail: Describe and add a few preperation methods for the product.

errors.not_available: üòî Woops! This food is not (yet) avaliable.
errors.not_available_detail: Please go back to the available foods on the foods tab.

file_upload.title: Upload your image
file_upload.subtitle: Drag and drop one
file_upload.result_desc: If this is a good representation, perfect! If not, please upload another one.

errors.cant_load_image: Woops.. We couldn't load your image. Please upload another one.

event_request_list.title: Unaccepted requests
event_request_list.description: In here you can keep track of new users who want you to be their specialist. They will send a request for a date for their first consultation. If you accept by clicking the checkbox, it will show up in your calendar. Please let the users know as fast as possible, so you don't lose your clients.

requests.reject_request: Are you sure you want to reject this request?

dialogs.sure_delete: Are you sure that you want to delete

confirm.erase_data: Are you sure? The data will be erased completely.
confirm.delete_user_confirm: The user can NOT be restored and the data will be LOST
confirm.messages_confirm: Are you sure? The messages will be erased completely.
confirm.accept_user: Are you sure that you want to let {{user}} into the app? If so, don't forget to set the subscription to valid in his/her profile afterwards

choose_mealplan.title: Choose a mealplan
choose_mealplan.intro: Choose a mealplan to get your shopping list

edit.edit_review: Edit the review written by {{name}} here. Only do this for spelling mistakes or if the user wants to change something. Please don't change people's opinions.
